head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSELEY, MARY JANE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSELEY, MARY JANE

block.p: MOSELEY-Mary Jane, on August 23. Beloved daughter of Astrid Onstad Talley and Glan Moseley. Dearly loved step-daughter of John J. Talley. Devoted sister of Christine Moseley and Kari Talley and the late Elizabeth Moseley. Services private. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to Columbia University, Eating Disorder Research, C/O NYSPI Unit 98, 1051 Riverside Drive, NY, NY 10032.
